2: "God is powerful and dreadful. He enforces peace in the heavens.
3: Who is able to count his heavenly army? Does his light not shine on all the earth?
4: How can a mere mortal stand before God and claim to be righteous? Who in all the earth is pure?
5: God is so glorious that even the moon and stars scarcely shine compared to him.
6: How much less are mere people, who are but worms in his sight?"
